overview: In this special report, VICE gets exclusive access to one of the hundreds of gay-conversion-therapy organisations, groups, and sessions in the United States. At the Journey into Manhood program, men pay more than $600 to attend a weekend retreat where they participate in exercises and activities the staff members claim will help them battle their same-sex Â­orientation. The only qualification to become a staff member is to have successfully completed the program.
title: Gay Conversion Therapy
